page.title: 17MY LEISURE TIME_SKELMERSDALE
page.content: continued from page 16 THURSDAY-On Thursday after school I don't usually have much to do.I play out with my friends or sometimes we visit my Nan. FRIDAY-On Friday after school I play out then my mum calls me in for tea. After tea I go to my Ballet Lesson. This is followed by a Show Dancing Class.I get home at 9p.m.,have some supper,get washed and go to bed.I always go to bed early on a Friday because I'm too tired to do anything else! SATURDAY-I go to my tap lesson in the morning.I go shopping or play out.Sometimes we go out for the day. SUNDAY-On Sunday we usually go to my Nan's or stay at home.Sharon my sister usually goes to church and I might go with her.Sometimes I go to my Auntie Eve's and play with my cousin.
